name: Snackiro: Shani Dips Twice
description:
You are Shani, a devious dip connoisseur and double-dipper. The party is in full swing and the hosts have laid out a glorious spread. It's time to get dipping!

Navigate the hallways of the house party dipping your nacho in as many dips as possible, then chow down on that flavour triangle for maximum points. Can you go for the legendary five-dip chip? How many points can you score in three minutes?

Not everyone will appreciate your double-dipping ways, however. Don't get caught in their line of sight with two dips on your chip, unless you want to be publicly embarrassed.

Controls:
W,A,S,D - move
E - pick up nacho, dip nacho
Spacebar - eat nacho

Developed by Charles Britton over three weeks as part of the Code Camp module of the National Film and Television School's Games Design and Development MA.

Credits
